scripts.package: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/custom-css-js-per-post && cp custom-css-js-per-post.php README.md LICENSE.txt readme.txt dist/custom-css-js-per-post && cd dist && zip -r ../custom-css-js-per-post-$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip custom-css-js-per-post && cd .. && rm -rf dist
